text: Night Winds is a 1978 fantasy horror collection of short stories by Karl Edward Wagner about his character Kane. The stories are "Undertow", "Two Suns Setting", "The Dark Muse", "Raven's Eyrie", "Lynortis Reprise", and "Sing a Last Song of Valdese". Category:Karl Edward Wagner Category:Horror short story collections Category:1978 short story collections pl:Wichry Nocy
title: Night Winds, collection
